snippet: Video of President Obama's speech, in which he stopped short of declaring victory over Al Qaeda but asserted, "we have a clear path to fulfill our mission in Afghanistan, was posted on the White House YouTube channel.
abstract: Video of President Obama's speech, in which he stopped short of declaring victory over Al Qaeda but asserted, "we have a clear path to fulfill our mission in Afghanistan, was posted on the White House YouTube channel.

headline.main: Video of Obama's Address From Afghanistan
